eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST for the following areas: Louisiana; at 07:35 PM ON DEC 12, 2025 Effective until 09:35 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: STATIONS AND CABLE SYSTEMS OF YOUR AREA.  EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM EQUIPMENT THAT CAN QUICKLY WARN YOU DURING EMERGENCIES IS BEING TESTED.  IF THIS HAD BEEN AN ACTUAL EMERGENCY, SUCH AS A TORNADO, FLOOD, EVACUATION, TOXIC RELEASE OR ANY EMERGENCY THAT YOU THE PUBLIC SHOULD BE TIMELY ALERTED, OFFICIAL MESSAGES WOULD HAVE FOLLOWED THE ALERT TONE.  THIS STATION SERVES AS A VITAL PART OF THE LOUISIANA STATE EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM.  THIS CONCLUDES THIS TEST OF THE EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM.
